GameControllerConfigService(8) System Manager's Manual GameControllerConfigService(8)

NAME

GameControllerConfigService — game controller configuration service

SYNOPSIS

GameControllerConfigService

DESCRIPTION

GameControllerConfigService parses certain configuration files on behalf of gamecontrollerd. It also manages background updates of game controller configuration data.

There are no configuration options to GameControllerConfigService . Users should not run GameControllerConfigService manually.

HISTORY

GameControllerConfigService was first introduced in macOS version 13.0 (Ventura).

SEE ALSO

gamecontrollerd(8)
